hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: (The established way of folding hands is) to hold the hands by the hands in prayer below the navel. Abu Dawud said: I heard Ahmad b. Hanbal say: The narrator 'Abd al-Rahman b. Ishaq al-Kufi is weak (i.e. not reliable)

chapter.ara-name: باب وَضْعِ الْيُمْنَى عَلَى الْيُسْرَى فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Placing The Right Hand On The Left In THe Prayer
